Text: dum! why dont you convert the files in mp3 format. it would reduce size. i would rather search an other download
@ut_bhai Because some of us like lossless audio. Do your research before calling ppl "dum", and you  won't look so stupid next time.

So many itune-junkies keep dumping their "high quality" 320kbps CBR rips all over the internetz, and it's annoying for us audiophiles. I fell for that trick already with this same OST - Horrible deep bass, that just seems to wobble and gurgle out of my speakers. Loud thuds and clashes that just sound like someone hitting a glass bottle and a hollow tube - Disgusting.
Good to see a quality upload of lossless quality mate, Cheers.

Have a good one.
